usecrypto.name: Better RNG
usecrypto.hint: Use a custom function to generate random numbers instead of Mersenne Twister (1997) for dice results.

onlyforplayer.name: Only for player
onlyforplayer.hint: Protect the dice random generator only for players.

enablefudgedice.name: Enable Fudge
enablefudgedice.hint: DM can modify his 'luck' (Please refresh your game by pressing F5).
